text: Did something break in the extensions. The event coming from pressing on Select or multiSelect components returns empty and not the users choice. <@U03FJQPSC0Y> several of my extensions broke

<@U03FJQPSC0Y> <@U05KNCMAE7N> Has there been any interest shown in developing a nav bar component? Would be nice to be able to create a nav bar either at the top or the left side of a component. I think it would certainly make it easier to toggle between different views/subviews for more complex  builds. Thoughts?

hello , I would like integrate Solar Inverter API directly into HubSpot CRM . what would be the best way to show the datas of inverter in CRM by creating a custom Objects or directly displying the data with the help of CRM cards ?
Ahh, I see. We have gotten a couple requests for these. Can you give me some examples for the different views you have?
The single line text work fine and the text value comes in the event provided in the callback but for multiselect and select its undefined
